programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan(n)

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The iron-willed comic book vigilante Frank Castle (a.k.a. "The Punisher") wages a one-man war on the New York mobsters that murdered his family in this action thriller starring Ray Stevenson, Dominic West and Julie Benz(n)

programme.title: Premature
programme.desc: A teenage boy is forced to relive the same life-changing day over and over again as he attempts to get into college and lose his virginity to the hottest girl in school(n)

programme.title: The Skulls II
programme.desc: An unsuspecting college student is drawn into the mysterious underworld of the nation's most powerful secret society. After joining the Skulls, Ryan Sommers (Robin Dunne) is warned not to betray any secrets about the organization or its high-powered members. However, when Ryan witnesses a murder within the Skulls' private chambers, he feels compelled to reveal the truth and finds that the closer he gets to doing so - the more dangerous life becomes. Peer pressure takes on a whole new meaning(n)

programme.title: Andrew Santino: Home Field Advantage
programme.desc: Half Mick, half WOP, hard-headed comedian Andrew Santino returns to his Chicago hometown for a stand-up special with the authentic taste of a city made of Italian beef, Old Style and deep dish. Shot at the historic Vic Theater, Santino touches on everything from growing up thinking he was black and a disgust with bachelorette parties, to his bouts with severe acne and male porn stars envy(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes(n)

programme.title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
programme.desc: Documentary that goes behind the stats to reveal the story of Kobe Bryant's career, exploring the mentorships, allies and rivalries that have helped shape his stellar 18-year tenure in the NBA, and offering access to his daily experiences, his lifelong inspirations and the battle with his greatest personal challenge yet(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later(n)

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship(n)

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister(n)

programme.title: Burke & Hare
programme.desc: A pair of financially strapped, 19th century Irishmen (Simon Pegg and Andy Serkis) discover a lucrative if gruesome source of income when they begin providing corpses for medical experiments to a well-regarded Edinburgh doctor. Their newly filled coffers and the expensive attentions of their romantic interests, however, soon pressure them to continue and even enhance the cadaver procurement process. Isla Fisher costars in this dark period comedy(n)

programme.title: Heartbreakers (2001)
programme.desc: Experts at seducing and fleecing wealthy men, mother-daughter grifters Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt arrive in Palm Beach, Florida, where they target an aging tobacco baron (Gene Hackman) and the owner (Jason Lee) of a beachside tavern. Ray Liotta, Anne Bancroft and Nora Dunn costar in this comedy from the writer of "Liar Liar."(n)

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead(n)

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: FBI Agent Will Graham is called out of early retirement to catch a serial killer known by authorities as "The Tooth Fairy". He asks for the help of his arch-nemesis, Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter, in bringing the serial killer to justice. However, "The Tooth Fairy" is also getting inside information about Graham and his family from Dr. Lecter. Academy Award winner Anthony Hopkins stars as Dr. Lecter, along with Academy Award nominee Edward Norton(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars as WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange in this dramatic thriller based on real events. In a quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power, an Internet startup becomes the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization(n)

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot
programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon is back - and using his potent voice to attack the haters and naysayers, while discussing everything from the controversial times we're living in to how getting old affects his dating. Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles(n)

programme.title: Burke & Hare
programme.desc: A pair of financially strapped, 19th century Irishmen (Simon Pegg and Andy Serkis) discover a lucrative if gruesome source of income when they begin providing corpses for medical experiments to a well-regarded Edinburgh doctor. Their newly filled coffers and the expensive attentions of their romantic interests, however, soon pressure them to continue and even enhance the cadaver procurement process. Isla Fisher costars in this dark period comedy(n)

programme.title: Stretch and Bobbito: Radio That Changed Lives
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two quirky friends who became unlikely legends by hosting a radio show that introduced the world to the biggest hip-hop artists of the 90s, including Nas, Biggie, Wu-Tang, Jay-Z, Eminem and the Fugees. Includes interviews with the rap world's luminaries(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe(n)

programme.title: Gigli
programme.desc: Gigli (Ben Affleck) is ordered to kidnap the psychologically-challenged younger brother of a powerful federal prosecutor. When plans go awry, Gigli's boss sends in Ricki (Jennifer Lopez), a gorgeous free-spirited female gangster who has her own set of orders, to assist with the kidnapping. Gigli begins falling for the decidedly unavailable Ricki, which is a hazard to his occupation(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City(n)

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum)(n)

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama(n)

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought(n)

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe(n)

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: A young climber named Peter Garrett (Chris O'Donnell), must launch a treacherous rescue effort up K2, the world's second-highest peak, to save his sister, Annie (Robin Tunney), and her summit team (Bill Paxton and Nicholas Lea). They are trapped at 26,000 feet - a death zone above the vertical limit of endurance. Every second counts as Peter and a crew of climbers ascend the heights of the peak to save her

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: Detective Frazier (Academy Award winner Denzel Washington) is a tough cop who matches wits with a clever bank robber named Dalton (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen). As the dangerous cat-and-mouse game unfolds, a wild card emerges: Madaline (Academy Award winner Jodie Foster), a power broker with a hidden agenda. Directed by Spike Lee

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this unusual psychological thriller as Earl Brooks, a doting husband and father, a successful businessman, and an award-winning philanthropist. Earl is beloved by his family and community, so nobody suspects that he is also a notorious, deranged serial killer who is under pressure from a zealously determined female detective (Demi Moore) and a sleazy photographer (Dane Cook) with evidence of his crimes. Marg Helgenberger and William Hurt costar

programme.title: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
programme.desc: James Spader stars as Graham Dalton, a drifter whose presence in a Louisiana home has a lasting effect on his old college friend John (Peter Gallagher), a lecherous yuppie having an affair with his wife's sister (Laura San Giacomo). Graham soon develops a friendship with John's repressed wife Ann (Andie MacDowell), who in turn discovers a secret about her houseguest that will change her life. The award-winning debut of first-time writer/director Steven Soderbergh ("Erin Brockovich," "Traffic")

programme.title: Bleed For This
programme.desc: Boxer Vinny Pazienza (Miles Teller) moves up two weight classes under the guidance of his new trainer Kevin Rooney (Aaron Eckhart). Pazienza takes down French boxer Gilbert Delé to become Super Middleweight Champion. Shortly after the bout however, a head-on car crash leaves him with a broken neck. Initially told he may never walk again, Pazienza chooses a risky "halo" spine-stabilization treatment, requiring him to wear a circular metal brace screwed directly into his skull for six months

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. He is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely Chicago token collector (Sandra Bullock) pines for a handsome commuter (Peter Gallagher). When she saves his life after a mugging that leaves him comatose, she's mistaken for his fiancee. Playing along, she instead falls in love with her "fiancee's" brother (Bill Pullman), thus setting in motion a decidedly bizarre love triangle. Jack Warden, Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Michael Rispoli, Ally Walker and Monica Keena costar in this romantic comedy that made Bullock a star

programme.title: One Too Many Mornings 3:4-8
programme.desc: In episode 201, the second season premiere, Tommy outmaneuvers a U.S. attorney as he and Eileen keep up the appearance of a happy marriage; Michael tries to reestablish his memory and his territory(c)

programme.title: Down In The Flood 3:5-6
programme.desc: In episode 202, as Tommy begins his reelection campaign, he turns to his sister, Mary-Kate, rather than Eileen for support; Colin Carr (Brian F. O'Byrne), Tommy and Michael's estranged Irish cousin whom Rose deeply distrusts, returns to Providence(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Mild Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.title: The Lonesome Death Of ... 4:7-8
programme.desc: In episode 203, Colin helps Michael and Eileen cope with the unexpected death of a friend while Freddie tries to avoid a war with the Italians; Tommy helps smooth things over with the Speaker of the House's mistress(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: The improbably true story of a charismatic conman's journey from small-town businessman to flamboyant white-collar criminal, who repeatedly finds himself on the lam, brilliantly escaping from prison on four separate occasions - all in the name of love. Starring Jim Carrey, Ewan McGregor and Leslie Mann

programme.title: Hateship Loveship
programme.desc: A wild teenage girl orchestrates a romance between her nanny and her father, who is a recovering addict. Stars Kristen Wiig and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms(n)

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely Chicago token collector (Sandra Bullock) pines for a handsome commuter (Peter Gallagher). When she saves his life after a mugging that leaves him comatose, she's mistaken for his fiancee. Playing along, she instead falls in love with her "fiancee's" brother (Bill Pullman), thus setting in motion a decidedly bizarre love triangle. Jack Warden, Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Michael Rispoli, Ally Walker and Monica Keena costar in this romantic comedy that made Bullock a star(n)

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: Daniel Craig stars as a dealer that has made a fortune selling cocaine and ecstasy. Now he's looking to retire while he's young enough to enjoy his gains. Crime boss Jimmy Price (Kenneth Cranham) needs a couple of favors first. The drug addict daughter of a mob overlord (Michael Gambon) has gone missing and Price wants her tracked down. Price also wants a middleman to buy a huge shipment of ecstasy from a loose-cannon crook called The Duke (Jamie Foreman)(n)

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: In an Academy Award® nominated role, Charlotte Rampling stars as a woman who finds out on her 45th wedding anniversary that her husband was once engaged to someone else(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Ben Hall
programme.desc: Focusing on the last nine months of Hall's life, when he's a well-established bushranger along with his accomplices, the film explores the relationships within the gang, their robberies and the details surrounding Hall's betrayal and controversial death at the hands of the police on May 5th, 1865. Starring Jack Martin(n)

programme.title: Not Dark Yet 3:5-6
programme.desc: In episode 204, Rose sows unrest between her sons, which leads Michael to throw a wrench into Tommy's big real estate deal; Freddie asks Declan to use his police badge to negotiate with the competition; Tommy and Dana see more of each other(n)

programme.title: Dear Landlord 1:3-4
programme.desc: In episode 205, Tommy struggles to stay on track when he suddenly finds himself without his usual support network; Michael considers a lifestyle change, while Colin tries to find his father; Freddie asks Declan to find a missing associate(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Mild Violence

programme.title: True Love Tends To Forget 1:1-4
programme.desc: In episode 206, Michael maneuvers for power as he and Kath prepare for an addition to the family; Tommy tries to clean up a bad neighborhood; Eileen gains perspective from the wives of other local politicians; Rose struggles with the reality of aging(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon(n)

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost(n)

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond(n)

Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon(n)

Gigli begins falling for the decidedly unavailable Ricki, which is a hazard to his occupation(n)

programme.title: Bruno
programme.desc: Bruno is a gay fashionista and host of a TV fashion show. His mission is to become the biggest Austrian celebrity since Hitler by crisscrossing the globe in the hopes of finding fame and love. Sacha Baron Cohen stars in the satire(n)

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Lavell is back home in St. Louis in his new comedy special. He discusses every holiday from what Christmas was like when he was a kid, to the guilt everyone feels on Mother's Day, to Thanksgiving and his family trips to Disneyland(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond(n)

programme.title: Who's Your Caddy?
programme.desc: Denied membership in an exclusive Hamptons country club, the millionaire rapper C-Note (Antwan Andre Patton) pulls off a clever real estate deal that guarantees him admission but also touches off a war with the club's snobby elite. Jeffrey Jones, Andy Milonakis and Faizon Love costar in this hilarious comedy of golf, rap, and class tension(n)

programme.title: Pride & Prejudice
programme.desc: Based on the Jane Austen novel, five sisters in a British family are ruled by a mother determined to marry her daughters into money. Academy Award nominee Keira Knightley stars as Elizabeth Bennett, along with Donald Sutherland, Academy Award winner Judi Dench and Academy Award nominee Brenda Blethyn(n)

programme.title: Only A Pawn ... 1:7-8
programme.desc: In episode 207, it's election day and the whole Caffee clan rises to Tommy's defense when his political enemies pull out the big guns to block his reelection; Nozzoli asks Michael to drive an out-of-town contractor to a job; Colin escorts Kath to a clinic(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Graphic Violence, Adult Content

programme.title: Shelter From The Storm 1:1-2
programme.desc: In episode 208, Tommy and Colin try to cope with Judd's decline; Declan tries to clear his conscience as Michael feeds Franklin information to keep Freddie in jail; Eileen volunteers to help Mary Kate at the Social Services office(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Strong Sexual Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others(n)

programme.title: Dolan's Cadillac
programme.desc: Robinson (Wes Bentley) is a law-abiding schoolteacher until his wife Elizabeth unexpectedly witnesses a murder. The killer is Jimmy Dolan (Christian Slater), Las Vegas' most ruthless and untouchable mob boss. Elizabeth agrees to testify, and faces deadly consequences. Devastated by her death, Robinson tries everything to bring Dolan to justice. Without hard evidence however, Dolan remains free. Haunted by the ghost of wife, Robinson transforms himself into a vengeance-obsessed machine, pushing himself beyond the breaking point(n)

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Michael Jennings (Ben Affleck) is being hunted, but he doesn't know why. A famous genius hired by high-tech corporations, Jennings routinely has his memory erased once a job is completed so as not to divulge any company secrets. He expects to earn eight figures for his latest project, but upon finishing the work, he is given an envelope full of random objects and told that he has agreed to forfeit all payment. With his memory erased per his contract, Jennings has no defense, until he discovers that the objects are clues to his past(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: Detective Frazier (Academy Award winner Denzel Washington) is a tough cop who matches wits with a clever bank robber named Dalton (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen). As the dangerous cat-and-mouse game unfolds, a wild card emerges: Madaline (Academy Award winner Jodie Foster), a power broker with a hidden agenda. Directed by Spike Lee(n)

programme.title: Orny Adams: More Than Loud
programme.desc: In his new stand-up special, Orny Adams fluctuates between the relevant and the absurd, attacking what's wrong with the world and at times including what's wrong with him

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.title: Brimstone
programme.desc: Liz (Dakota Fanning) is full of heart and grit but is being hunted by a vengeful Preacher (Guy Pearce) who is a diabolical zealot. She's a genuine survivor and uses her strength to claim the better life she and her daughter deserve

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: Clarence Worley (CHRISTIAN SLATER) has very little romance in his life. He's a loner who works in a comic book shop, spends most of his spare hours watching old kung-fu movies in shabby local cinemas and is in his own world. Then Alabama (PATRICIA ARQUETTE) walks into the Lyric Theatre and changes that world forever. After a whirlwind courtship, Clarence commits a crime defending Alabama's honor. His noble act spins the couple onto a collision course with gangsters and police which takes them from Detroit to Los Angeles

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress

programme.title: Cheech & Chong's Next Movie
programme.desc: The two friends go on more drug-influenced misadventures, as Cheech must deal with losing his job and Chong parties in Hollywood. Featuring the screen debut of Pee Wee Herman (Paul Reubens)

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself

programme.title: Fair Game (2010)
programme.desc: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Hank Mitchell (Bill Paxton) is a humble small town store manager that, with his dimwitted brother Jacob (Billy Bob Thornton) discovers a long-lost bag of money in a plane wreck. The money can only be ill-gotten booty, but in a moment of weakness the brothers take the loot and fail to report the crash - a decision that will have tragic consequences. Bridget Fonda costars in this thriller from director Sam Raimi ("Spider-Man") based on the best-selling novel by Scott Smith

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon

programme.title: American Outlaws
programme.desc: When the citizens of a Midwest town learn that a corrupt railroad baron intends to force them off their land in the name of progress, a group of young farmers join forces to reclaim what is rightfully theirs. In the course of serving this vendetta, the renegade farmers become the targets of the biggest manhunt in the history of the Old West. But none is more targeted or hunted than their leader, a charismatic young outlaw by the name of Jesse James. Staring Colin Farrell, Scott Caan and Ali Larter(n)

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: Prograis vs. Ramos (R)
programme.desc: Super lightweight Regis Prograis versus Abel Ramos. REPLAY(n)

programme.title: Season With Navy Football, A: Episode 12
programme.desc: This week on A SEASON WITH NAVY FOOTBALL, go behind-the-scenes with exclusive on and off the field access to Coach Niumatalolo and the Midshipmen as they prepare for an annual tradition and highlight of the season: the Army-Navy game(n)

programme.title: Double D Dude Ranch
programme.desc: Erotic tale about a bunch of busty cowgirls who know how to ride a stallion... hard(n)

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon(n)

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: On distant planets, a royal messiah has been born who will restore order to the universe, but there are forces that don't want evil to be vanquished!(n)

programme.title: Tough Guys
programme.desc: In 1979, more than a decade before the Ultimate Fighting Championship, Bill Viola and Frank Caliguri dream up a contest pitting bar big mouths against wrestlers, martial artists, boxers and brawlers, and bill it as a new no-holds-barred type of competitive fighting. When the fights succeed beyond their wildest expectations, they're swept up in a chain of events that end in the first mixed-martial arts ban in the nation. The film chronicles the inception of Caliguri and Viola's first bouts and the colorful cast of fighters who made them a hit(n)

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death(n)

programme.title: Who's Your Caddy?
programme.desc: Denied membership in an exclusive Hamptons country club, the millionaire rapper C-Note (Antwan Andre Patton) pulls off a clever real estate deal that guarantees him admission but also touches off a war with the club's snobby elite. Jeffrey Jones, Andy Milonakis and Faizon Love costar in this hilarious comedy of golf, rap, and class tension(n)

programme.title: The Rundown
programme.desc: Travis (Seann William Scott) is a fast-talking double dealer whose dad commissions Beck (The Rock) to retrieve him from an adventure in Brazil. Travis is more of a handful than Beck expects and not just because of his mouth. He brings a couple of other complications with him: Mariana (Rosario Dawson), a no-nonsense local who holds the answers to some of the jungle's mysteries and Hatcher (Christopher Walken), an unhinged despot who has turned the raw jungle and its inhabitants into his own fortune-making, gold-mining empire(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers(n)

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A dark thriller about a group of young adults who wake up on a deserted tropical island to find they are being hunted down in a sinister plot to harvest their organs. Stars Edward Furlong and Daryl Hannah(n)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness(n)

programme.title: Bleed For This
programme.desc: Boxer Vinny Pazienza (Miles Teller) moves up two weight classes under the guidance of his new trainer Kevin Rooney (Aaron Eckhart). Pazienza takes down French boxer Gilbert Delé to become Super Middleweight Champion. Shortly after the bout however, a head-on car crash leaves him with a broken neck. Initially told he may never walk again, Pazienza chooses a risky "halo" spine-stabilization treatment, requiring him to wear a circular metal brace screwed directly into his skull for six months(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: Detective Frazier (Academy Award winner Denzel Washington) is a tough cop who matches wits with a clever bank robber named Dalton (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen). As the dangerous cat-and-mouse game unfolds, a wild card emerges: Madaline (Academy Award winner Jodie Foster), a power broker with a hidden agenda. Directed by Spike Lee(n)

programme.desc: This week on A SEASON WITH NAVY FOOTBALL, go behind-the-scenes at USNA's biggest game of the year as Coach Niumatalolo and the Midshipmen meet the Black Knights of Army in an annual battle between archrivals. Season finale(n)

programme.title: Maniac
programme.desc: Frank (Elijah Wood) is the withdrawn owner of a mannequin store, whose life changes when young artist Anna appears asking for his help with her new exhibition. As their friendship develops, Frank's obsession escalates and the number of victims increases. It becomes clear to Anna that Frank is far more dangerous than he seems(n)

programme.title: The Scarehouse
programme.desc: Two years after a tragic accident, six girls are invited to a party inside an elaborate Halloween funhouse. Once inside, they realize the true purpose of the event: to torture them as part of a revenge scheme. Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers(n)

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life(n)

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress(n)

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan(n)

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: A young climber named Peter Garrett (Chris O'Donnell), must launch a treacherous rescue effort up K2, the world's second-highest peak, to save his sister, Annie (Robin Tunney), and her summit team (Bill Paxton and Nicholas Lea). They are trapped at 26,000 feet - a death zone above the vertical limit of endurance. Every second counts as Peter and a crew of climbers ascend the heights of the peak to save her(n)

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: America's most hardened and dangerous criminals are transported via Con Air, a customized armored aircraft equipped with armed guards, hand and leg shackles, and top secret destinations. No one has ever escaped from one of these flying fortresses. A group of violent and deadly cons seizes control of one of the planes, taking the guards hostage and setting a course out of the country. Poe, an inmate who has done his time and is being shipped home to be reunited with his family, proves to be a fly in their ointment(n)

programme.title: Don't Knock Twice
programme.desc: A successful sculptor named Jess returns to the UK to rebuild her relationship with Chloe, the daughter she was forced to give up nine years ago. When she agrees to come and live with her, Jess learns that Chloe has not come to stay because she wants to get to know her mother again. She has come because she is scared that a supernatural curse has claimed the life of her boyfriend, Danny, and is now coming for her. Chloe and Danny made the mistake of visiting an abandoned house once home to a witch, that comes for you if you knock on the door(n)

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Classic romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts as a world famous movie star, who finds an unlikely connection with a troubled bookstore owner in the eclectic London neighborhood of Notting Hill. Co-stars Hugh Grant

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: Smoke Signals
programme.desc: A stoic young Coeur d'Alene man grudgingly allows his nerdy friend to travel with him from their home on an Idaho reservation to Phoenix, Arizona, in order to settle the affairs of his recently-deceased alcoholic father. Along the way, the truth about a childhood tragedy unites them, along with revelations about what it takes to be a real Native American. Irene Bedard costars

programme.title: Return To Me
programme.desc: After he suffers the devastating loss of his beloved wife Elizabeth, a Chicago building contractor (David Duchovny) unknowingly falls in love with the woman (Minnie Driver) who received Elizabeth's transplanted heart. Carroll O'Connor, James Belushi, Robert Loggia, Joely Richardson, David Alan Grier and Bonnie Hunt (who also wrote and directed) costar in this charming romantic comedy-drama

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Classic romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts as a world famous movie star, who finds an unlikely connection with a troubled bookstore owner in the eclectic London neighborhood of Notting Hill. Co-stars Hugh Grant

programme.title: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Music legend Bob Dylan flies to London one day to visit his mate Dave Stewart. After getting lost, Bob finally arrives at the address and finds himself waiting for Dave in his flat dutifully being served tea by his girlfriend. But is he really in the right place? Starring Eddie Marsan, Paul Ritter and Katherine Parkinson

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions(n)

programme.desc: A thirteen-year-old Philadelphia girl (Elisha Cuthbert) from the 20th Century travels through time with a couple of pals (Gabrielle Boni, Matthew Harbour) from the 19th Century in this family adventure with Timothy Busfield and Michael Sinelnikoff(n)

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury(n)

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: 65 million years ago, Aladar the iguanodon is separated from his own kind and raised by a clan of lemurs, including the wisecracking Zini and the compassionate Plio. When a meteor shower destroys their home, Aladar and his family follow a herd of dinosaurs heading for the safety of the "nesting grounds." Along the way, Aladar befriends Baylene, an elderly brachiosaur, Eema, an unstoppable styrachosaur, and Neera, a feisty fellow iguanodon. Together, they must stand strong amidst food shortages and threats from predators(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself(n)

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate navigates emotional and cultural land mines when she accepts a position as nanny to the spoiled, bratty child of a demanding, wealthy Manhattan couple in this comedy based on the best-selling novel. Scarlett Johansson, Laura Linney, Paul Giamatti, Chris Evans, Alicia Keys and Nicholas Art star(n)

programme.desc: Parker Posey and Eric McCormack star in this comedy about a couple who set out to build a new home and enlist the services of an uncompromising modernist architect who proceeds to build his dream house, instead of theirs(n)

programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: Thelma & Louise
programme.desc: Two best friends (Geena Davis and Susan Sarandon) set out on an adventure. It soon turns into a terrifying escape from the police after they go on crime spree across the American southwest. Brad Pitt co-stars

programme.title: The Band's Visit
programme.desc: A band comprised of Egyptian Policemen head to Israel to play at the inaugural ceremony of an Arab arts center, only to find themselves lost in the wrong town. This ultimately leads to revelations that cross cultural boundaries

programme.title: Can't Hardly Wait
programme.desc: The graduation ceremony is over at Huntington Hills High, and it's time for the real festivities to begin at the graduation party. Aspiring writer Preston Meyers (Ethan Embry) has been carrying a torch for class knockout Amanda Beckett (Jennifer Love Hewitt) for years. His tormented infatuation culminates at the party, where he seizes the opportunity to declare his love for her after she is dumped by her jock boyfriend (Peter Facinelli). Relationships and friendships are broken and formed

programme.title: Citizen Ruth
programme.desc: An irresponsible, drug-addicted, recently impregnated woman finds herself in the middle of an abortion debate when both parties attempt to sway her to their respective sides

programme.title: Thelma & Louise

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with

programme.title: Trump Show
programme.desc: The political circus goes into overdrive as Trump is crowned the Republican nominee - and Melania, controversially, speaks! Capitalizing on his children to help humanize his image, can Trump plus Pence finally rally a unified party?(c)

programme.title: In the Arena
programme.desc: The jeers and boos of Sanders diehards ring out in Philadelphia, before the Democrats at last make Hillary a historic nominee. But is shattering a glass ceiling enough for Clinton and Kaine to unite the party into a winning coalition?(c)

programme.title: Closing the Gap
programme.desc: With ten weeks to go until the election the Trump campaign finds itself running from behind. As members of his party start to publicly jump ship, can Trump find a way to close the gap with Clinton or will he just fall further behind?(c)

programme.title: Fit To Serve
programme.desc: With revelations of Clinton's pneumonia and scrutiny surrounding Trump's medical records, the question of their fitness to lead takes a physical turn. As both campaigns try to punt the issue can the seconds-in-command handle the heat?(c)

programme.title: Last Weekend
programme.desc: Celia (Patricia Clarkson) is an aging matriarch who wants everyone to gather one last time at her family's gorgeous Lake Tahoe manor and reminisce before she puts it on the market. However, her sons are too preoccupied with their own busy lives and struggling relationships for any nostalgia. The dream of a splendid Labor Day weekend dies quickly in a whirlwind of contention, crisis and family dysfunction. Celia is forced to let go of her fantasy and attend to the harsh reality brought on by a sudden emergency

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum)(n)

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon(n)

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: Lush cinematic feat of three interwoven classic Italian fairytales which feature a queen on a bitter quest, two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king and a young daughter who must wrestle with her father’s obsession with a giant flea. Starring Salma Hayek and Vincent Cassel(n)

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City(n)

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: Hateship Loveship
programme.desc: A wild teenage girl orchestrates a romance between her nanny and her father, who is a recovering addict. Stars Kristen Wiig and Guy Pearce(n)

programme.title: Battleground
programme.desc: As Clinton and Trump prepare for the first of their debates, the campaigns target a handful of states that could swing the election. But in the must-win battleground of Florida can either candidate work out a path to gaining the edge?(n)

programme.title: The Newsrooms
programme.desc: From debate prep to the big night and the flaps that follow, the script gets flipped as the candidates cede the spotlight to an inside peek into the days and nights of the people who broadcast the news and cover the political sphere(n)

programme.title: Tale of the Tape
programme.desc: Tracking the fallout from the second debate and the scandal surrounding a now-infamous audio tape, could this be the final nail in Trump's campaign coffin - or can he pull off a surprise October Surprise to rally yet another comeback?(n)

programme.title: From Russia with Love
programme.desc: Amid claims of foreign intervention, international espionage and widespread hacking, Clinton faces what might turn out to be her toughest opponent to date: WikiLeaks, and the trove of highly sensitive, private emails it's made public(n)

programme.title: Burning Bodhi
programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town(n)

programme.title: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
programme.desc: James Spader stars as Graham Dalton, a drifter whose presence in a Louisiana home has a lasting effect on his old college friend John (Peter Gallagher), a lecherous yuppie having an affair with his wife's sister (Laura San Giacomo). Graham soon develops a friendship with John's repressed wife Ann (Andie MacDowell), who in turn discovers a secret about her houseguest that will change her life. The award-winning debut of first-time writer/director Steven Soderbergh ("Erin Brockovich," "Traffic")(n)

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world(n)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life(n)

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz(n)

programme.title: Prince: Sign 'o' the Times
programme.desc: This concert film features clips of live stage performances from Rotterdam and Minnesota, and is also interspersed with short films from the artist. Fan favorites, such as 'Little Red Corvette' and 'U Got the Look,' are performed as Prince is accompanied on stage by Sheena Easton and drummer Sheila E(n)

programme.title: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
programme.desc: James Spader stars as Graham Dalton, a drifter whose presence in a Louisiana home has a lasting effect on his old college friend John (Peter Gallagher), a lecherous yuppie having an affair with his wife's sister (Laura San Giacomo). Graham soon develops a friendship with John's repressed wife Ann (Andie MacDowell), who in turn discovers a secret about her houseguest that will change her life. The award-winning debut of first-time writer/director Steven Soderbergh ("Erin Brockovich," "Traffic")(n)

programme.title: Body of Deceit
programme.desc: Alice (Kristanna Loken) is a ghostwriter for a famous author. She is halfway through the work of his new book, but cannot write anymore. A year has passed since she had a terrible accident in Malta where she was staying with her husband Max (Antonio Cupo) in his family villa and was in a coma for two weeks. Since then, she has been suffering from depression and has recurrent and cryptic nightmares. Max persuades her to go back to Malta in the hopes that something will unblock her mind so she can start working again and meet her deadline(n)

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments(n)

programme.title: In the Bedroom
programme.desc: The Fowlers are a typical family in Maine. Matt is the town doctor and loves to fish. His wife, Ruth, is the school's choir leader, and their son, Frank, is home from his first year of college. Frank is in love with Natalie, a mother who isn't quite divorced yet from her husband, Richard. It makes Richard's blood boil to see his wife running around with another man. The affair takes a sudden and tragic turn, and the Fowlers are forced to confront the harsh reality of their situation(n)

programme.title: His Word as a Biden
programme.desc: The final two-week push going into the election sees the full weight of the White House come out in force for Clinton's campaign, including one man who has the potential to swing those states still up for grabs: Joe Biden(n)

programme.title: Nobody F***ing Knows
programme.desc: Clinton in Arizona? Trump in Washington? As different polls predict differing outcomes both campaigns make a case in far-fetched battlegrounds. In a race that's either up for grabs or already decided, hope, it seems, springs eternal(n)

programme.title: President Trump
programme.desc: In a special hour-long episode of the real-time documentary series, Mark Halperin, John Heilemann and Mark McKinnon go behind the scenes of both campaigns in the lead up to Election Day - and the fallout that followed. Series finale(n)

programme.title: Shocking But Not Surprising
programme.desc: Mark Halperin takes a ride on Airforce One with President Donald Trump. We look at the debate surrounding the healthcare bill and hear from both sides, including Sen. Ted Cruz, Sen. Rand Paul and the White House. Season premiere(n)

programme.title: More Than T
programme.desc: Beyond the headlines and debates about gender rights witness the multidimensional lives of seven transgender and gender nonconforming individuals as told through the lens of celebrated filmmaker Silas Howard (‘Transparent')(n)

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno(n)

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life(n)

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely Chicago token collector (Sandra Bullock) pines for a handsome commuter (Peter Gallagher). When she saves his life after a mugging that leaves him comatose, she's mistaken for his fiancee. Playing along, she instead falls in love with her "fiancee's" brother (Bill Pullman), thus setting in motion a decidedly bizarre love triangle. Jack Warden, Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Michael Rispoli, Ally Walker and Monica Keena costar in this romantic comedy that made Bullock a star(n)

programme.title: Cold Creek Manor
programme.desc: Cooper Tilson (Dennis Quaid) and his wife Leah (Golden Globe winner Sharon Stone) are New Yorkers wanting to escape city life for the saner, safer countryside. They move their two children into a dilapidated old mansion filled with the possessions of the previous family. Turning it into their dream house becomes a living nightmare when the previous owner (Stephen Dorff) shows up, and a series of terrifying incidents leads them on a search for clues to the estate's dark and lurid past(n)

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's classic sci-fi tale about two ordinary Midwesterners who are transformed by extraordinary chance meetings with visitors from outer space. Vilmos Zsigmond won an Oscar for his dazzling cinematography. (cc)

programme.title: It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: Stellar sci-fi thriller adapted from a Ray Bradbury tale is set in an Arizona desert town, where an amateur stargazer can't convince the locals that what he thought was a meteor crash-landing nearby was actually an alien spacecraft. Originally shown in 3D. (cc)

programme.title: The Cossacks
programme.desc: A Russian pacifist is dubbed a coward by his warrior father, fellow villagers and the woman he loves, until he suffers a life-changing humiliation and turns into a fierce fighter whose pride threatens to get the better of him

programme.title: Nine Days in One Year
programme.desc: Despite being exposed to a dangerous dose of radiation, a scientist continues with his experiments and even goes forward with marrying his girlfriend, but his continued involvement with his project threatens the union and his life

programme.title: Fear

programme.title: Elvis Mitchell: Under the Influence
programme.desc: Filmmaker Quentin Tarantino discusses his love of B-movies, the first horror flick that scared him (1972's "The Last House on the Left") and his favorite films, including "Magnificent Obsession" (1954) and "Meet Me in St. Louis" (1944). Tarantino also talks about great comic performances, such as Cary Grant in "His Girl Friday" (1940), Eli Wallach in "The Good, the Bad and the Ugly" (1966) and Rex Harrison in "Unfaithfully Yours" (1948). (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: What Price Hollywood?

programme.title: Death of a Scoundrel

programme.desc: A hard-partying rock-and-roll record producer opens her posh California digs to her stuffy son and his equally stuffy fiancée. The character study was written and directed by Lisa Cholodenko, who was partially inspired to make the film while listening to Joni Mitchell's landmark "Ladies of the Canyon" album. Actor Alessandro Nivola, who plays Ian, lead singer of an English rock band, does his own vocals. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A rural high-school misfit, who lives with an equally odd family, helps his oddball friend run for class president. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mafia!
programme.desc: Spoof about the rise and fall of an ambitious casino manager tapped to inherit the reins of the Sicilian crime syndicate run by his father. (cc)(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: A party-centric fraternity causes all sorts of havoc and hijinks on a college campus in the early 1960s, leading to their expulsion and a grand act of revenge. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Jersey Boys
programme.desc: This musical drama chronicles the rise and fall of Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons, one of the key pop groups of the early '60s, responsible for such iconic hits as "Sherry," "Walk Like a Man" and "Big Girls Don't Cry." (cc)(n)

programme.title: Winter's Tale
programme.desc: A thief falls for a wealthy woman who's dying of tuberculosis in 1916 New York. Later, he winds up in the modern day and works with a single mother to find a way to reunite with his true love. (cc)(n)

programme.title: An Innocent Man

programme.title: Three Kings

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by costars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined janitor who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist (Robin Williams, who also won an Oscar). (cc)(n)

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Miles and Jack take a trip to California's wine country the week before Jack gets married. While Miles wants to turn Jack on to the art of wine tasting, Jack longs to exploit his last days as a bachelor when they encounter two fascinating women. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two mild-mannered cousins search for a beloved pet kitten after the feline is taken during a home burglary. However, they get in over their heads when their quest leads them to infiltrate a violent street gang by posing as drug dealers. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mr. Mom
programme.desc: A laid-off auto engineer runs the household while his wife takes the role of breadwinner, and he ends up playing poker with the neighborhood housewives and considering infidelity with a dedicated homewrecker. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan

programme.title: Transcendence

programme.title: Manhunter

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: A kind of `Cosby' or `Father Knows Best' for the times, about a trucking-company executive, his wife and their three kids in suburban Connecticut. A steady performer for ABC, `Wife' ranges from issue-oriented to slapstick. It's very much the vision of star Damon Wayans (also a coexecutive producer), who based it in part on his own life, and frequently uses family members as actors, directors and screenwriters. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: A kind of `Cosby' or `Father Knows Best' for the times, about a trucking-company executive, his wife and their three kids in suburban Connecticut. A steady performer for ABC, `Wife' ranges from issue-oriented to slapstick. It's very much the vision of star Damon Wayans (also a coexecutive producer), who based it in part on his own life, and frequently uses family members as actors, directors and screenwriters. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura(n)

programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura(n)

programme.desc: Funella has written the beginning to a new song to welcome guests into the Furchester Hotel. It's very very catchy. So catchy that it instantly gets stuck in Harvey P Dull's head and it's really getting on his nerves. Furgus suggests that he takes a walk in the garden to clear his head, but that doesn't work. Cookie Monster tries singing him a new song, the Cookie Cookie Yum Yum song but that doesn't work either. Elmo suggests that he tries counting, which works for a little while, but then the song comes back into his head! But the Furchester's can solve any problem and when it seems that Harvey can't take it anymore; Funella announces that she has finished the welcome song! Phoebe gets a monster idea: If they sing the song all the way to the end, then it might end in Harvey's head too. Everyone in the hotel sings the song and at the end Harvey is cured!(n)
